Package Ex4

Class NumbersGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ex4.NumbersGame
  • public class NumbersGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    mulugeta Date - June 16-2019 this class has two programs and GUI Graphics the first program is numbers game, computer vs student using algorithm the computer calculate every round odd index values and even index values then choose the best option to win the game the second program is student vs student without algorithm
